column2: title=Leski Auctions: Sport and General Memorabilia, 10th February 20

column1: '''''Leski Auctions: Sport and General Memorabilia, 10th February 2005''''' is an auction catalogue from Charles Leski Auctions. The description for Lot 72 includes a full reproduction (photographs) of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Letter to Mrs Souch
*[http://www.leski.com.au/catalogues/a254/forthcoming.php Online version (pdf and html)] at Leski.com.au
